root.name: Minna de Taikan Dokusho DS: Cho-Kowai! Gakkou no Kaidan
root.description: OverviewMinna de Taikan Dokusho DS: Cho-Kowai! Gakkou no Kaidan is an adventure game developed and published by Dorasu, Inc. for the Nintendo DS platform. Minna de Taikan Dokusho DS: Cho-Kowai! Gakkou no Kaidan was never released outside of Japan.
